text: ۞وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
translation.id: Dan sungguh, sebelum dia (Musa dan Harun) telah Kami berikan kepada Ibrahim petunjuk, dan Kami telah mengetahui dia
